function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Blurred distinction between different pathways of respiratory infections","Impact":"Increased difficulty in preventing transmission of infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Improved education and awareness about the transmission pathways of respiratory infections","Technologies":"Education and communication tools for spreading awareness","People":"General public, healthcare workers","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Less transmission by large droplets and surfaces, and more by the airborne route","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne transmission in indoor environments","Mitigation":"Implementation of effective ventilation systems to dilute and remove infectious particles in indoor air","Technologies":"Mechanical ventilation systems, air purifiers","People":"Building owners, facility managers, healthcare facilities","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, healthcare facilities"},{"Description":"Transmission of COVID-19 and 2 deaths attributed primarily to airborne transmission","Impact":"Serious health consequences and fatalities due to airborne spread of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to social distancing measures and use of personal protective equipment to minimize airborne transmission","Technologies":"Personal protective equipment, air quality monitoring systems","People":"General public, healthcare workers","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, employers"}]}
